description: Waterproof, windproof, breathable, and exceptionally versatile, the Beta AR is made for all things alpine. The GORE-TEX PRO with Most Rugged Technology – a next-gen material we developed in collaboration with Gore – delivers maximum durability. The helmet-compatible StormHood™ adjusts to move with your head and maximize peripheral vision, articulated patterning elevates freedom of movement, and an embedded RECCO® reflector can aid search in emergency situations.
name: Arcteryx Beta AR Jacket, Stormhood - Mens
